courses.Whatweoffer: We do offer a variety of courses including Data Science, Java programming etc.
courses.Departments: Our University has 2 departments: Computer Science & Cyber Security
courses.Professors: Our academic staff contains one of the most trained staff and professors
courses.Campuses: Our University has 2 campuses in Kosovo

OpenDays: Our university operates Monday through Friday, welcoming students, faculty, and visitors from 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

ContactUS.Contactviamessage: You can contact us using Instagram or Facebook @uus
ContactUS.Contactviaemail: You can contact us via Email: uus_infomation@uus-edu.org
ContactUS.Contactviaphone: You can contact us through oue phone numbers: +383 12 345 678 or +383 21 345 678
ContactUS.ContactCampus: You can come to the campus area of the UUS and our staff will direct you to the correct office

Howtoapply.Applyviaform: In first page you shall see the apply button in the top-right corner there you fill the inputs and apply
Howtoapply.Applyviaphone: You can call one of our agents on our phone mubers +383 12 345 678 or +383 21 345 678
Howtoapply.Applyviaemail: You can apply via email by sending you CV and diplomas
Howtoapply.ApplyFromCampus: You can come in one of the campuses of UUS and apply physically
